column2: By controlling, directly or indirectly, the manifold principalities, duchies and free cities that make up the region of Überwald, we can unite our people into one singular nation state once again.

The Black Ribbon Pledge is a new counter culture sweaping across Überwald and Beyond. The Pledge requires vampires to swear off all drinking of blood and instead focus their thirsts into other hobbies. The Pledge will bring Vampires into the century of the Anchovy.
